author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
method: In a bowl, mix together the lemon juice and mascarpone until well combined.  Stir in the icing sugar, then the blueberries and mashed banana. Transfer the ice cream mixture to a freezeable, lidded container. Freeze for at least two hours, or until solid. To serve, scoop the ice cream into bowls and sprinkle with blueberries. Serve with a wafer biscuit.
